rows.label: qst620401_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, Boss.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0002
rows.name:
Boss do many salvage, many 
adventure, many place, right?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0003
rows.name:
Yeah! We've been all over the place
now you mention it.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0004
rows.name:
Of course I've salvaged in Gula and
Superbia, who hasn't? But also
Temperantia and the Cliffs of Mors...

rows.label: qst620401_msg0005
rows.name:
Hah! I never even imagined I'd go
salvaging in places like that before I
met Homura.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0006
rows.name:
But Boss not get tired of it all? Not
feel like do everything, see everything?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0007
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, a little bit of yes and a
little bit of both. I've done so much...

rows.label: qst620401_msg0008
rows.name:
But that's the thing with salvaging - 
you can always go deeper or further.
So... What I'm saying is, I don't know!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0009
rows.name:
Boss never can make mind up!
But Tora have good news!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0010
rows.name: Good news? What sort of news?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0011
rows.name:
Tora figure out way to power up
Cloud Sea Compass.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0012
rows.name: Power it up?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0013
rows.name: What's that gonna do, then?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0014
rows.name:
Power up means it find new Salvage
Points! Maybe many more to find, and
current Compass not strong enough.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0015
rows.name: But also maybe no. Tora not sure.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0016
rows.name:
Haha, and you say I have trouble 
making up my mind!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0017
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Well, maybe Tora just
try and see what happen.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0018
rows.name: Can't hurt, I suppose.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0019
rows.name:
But, Tora, what kind of parts are 
we going to need for this?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0020
rows.name:
Another Perfect Range Sensor?
Or one of those Zigzag Shafts or
Thunder Compasses?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0021
rows.name:
Boss enjoy hunt for parts, huh?
Well, Tora sorry to disappoint, but
this time not needing anything!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0022
rows.name: What? Nothing at all?

rows.label: qst620401_msg0023
rows.name: Nothing at all!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0024
rows.name:
Tora do little bit this, little bit that,
and power go up-up!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0025
rows.name:
I'm not sure I wanna ask what all that
entails... Eh, I'm leaving it to you, Tora!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0101
rows.name: Is done, is done!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0102
rows.name: Cheers, Tora!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0103
rows.name:
Maybe too soon to say 'thank you',
Boss.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0104
rows.name:
Maybe find new Salvage Points, maybe
not. As Tora say, is just theory!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0105
rows.name:
Well, there's no better reason to test
it out then!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0106
rows.name: Right, then... Let's see here.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0107
rows.name:
Looks like we might be able to do some
salvaging from the Old Factory in Superbia.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0108
rows.name: And more, and more!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0109
rows.name:
Ysheva Harbor in the Liberalitan 
Archipelago looks promising, too!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0110
rows.name:
Look-look! Also worth salvaging at
Forgotten Waste in Gula, Tora think!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0111
rows.name:
And there's another prospect at
Balquors Ruins in the Cliffs of Mors.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0112
rows.name: So that's four places all in all!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0113
rows.name:
It not mean definitely salvage treasure
in each place though. Boss go and
look, see for self.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0114
rows.name:
Maybe, but they're still promising spots
that I never knew about. Worth a try!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0115
rows.name: Maybe find good things!

rows.label: qst620401_msg0116
rows.name:
Oh, oh. And best to use Normal 
Cylinder, Tora think.

rows.label: qst620401_msg0117
rows.name:
Good idea. Don't want to waste any
of the good ones on a test, eh?
